PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-01632018-02-21PCH,  ,  ,  , 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of LINDA NOWLAN of Vancouver, British Columbia, to be a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum of Nature, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective June 25, 2018, in the place of Reg Manhas, whose term has expired.
AttachmentsAttachment
